name: Space Gem-Stronaut
description:
This is my 2D Platformer Project.

Modifications:

1) New behavior for a smart walking enemy, he walks with out platfroms

2) 2 New levels with amazing design and enemies to jump on

3) Funny challenge with a tone of moving platforms at the 2 level

4) Levels are huge
